component.name: Commander Genius
component.summary: An Engine used to play the "Commander Keen" game series

description.p: Commander-Genius aka CloneKeenPlus is an engine which interprets Commander Keen 1-6 (Vorticons and Galaxy Series and Dreams).

But there is more, how about 4 Player Coop, VGA graphics, remastered Music and great mods. There even exists the unoffical trilogy that was planned back then (Keen 7-9) which is fully supported by CG.

Obviously you need the game data of the games to play it. No worries, we provide an integrated stores where you download them automatically and let CG configure everything for you. Episode 2, 3, 5 and 6 are registered versions which can be purchased by 3D Realms or Apogee, or bought by someone else. If you still have the old games of the registered version, then copy those into a reachable directory and give it a try.

component.developer_name: Gerhard Stein, Elias Oenal, Pelya and Contributors
